content:
HL7® FHIR® Patient Access API Implementation Event HL7 Virtual FHIR Connectathon 8/17-19

TImeline of Activites

Tuesday August 18 at 2:00 pm ET
CARIN IG for Blue Button® Overview

Wednesday August 19 at 11:00 am ET
11:00 AM ET: Implementation-a-Thon Kickoff
11:30 AM: Implementation-a-Thon Begins
2:30 PM ET: Implementation-a-Thon Concludes
3:30-5:00 PM ET: Wrap Up

Participants, please add your information in the public tracker:
https://bit.ly/CARIN-API-Event

The Track Page can be found here:
https://bit.ly/CARIN-API-Track-Page

If you have not already registered for the Connectathon, please register here: https://www.hl7.org/events/fhir/implementation/2020/.

Mark Roberts said:

In this Implementation-a-Thon, Can I just have a client (which uses any other participants sandbox server) which represents EOB?OR I need my own sandbox server?
Sure, you can have just a client

Michele Mottini said:

Sure, you can have just a client

I have create a client application which is working with CDS Hook and then displaying the Medications, Problems, Procedures etc. entities from BCDA data. Will it work?
